title: kopipe
author: kopipe
content: Code:-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----Hash: SHA256In anticipation of acceptance of the contract attached as a signed LaTeX document, with Dabs having been chosen as escrow (I understand his service is historical but our relationship goes back many years and I trust him despite his debts to others), I am making this thread to keep a record of the process of the transfer of the domain 420CHAN.ORG.The PDF file itself is attached as armored, clearsigned base64, as well.-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----iHUEARYIAB0WIQS1rLeeEfG/f0nzK7hYUwVpYvFOWAUCZDR+CAAKCRBYUwVpYvFOWBfKAP9U75DLwnrfQpHsnRM1kRxUMpDFRQ2t6hWFNppN5X+j5gEAwtB+mq64Y7zISs+l8JCQ0c6iGhHZ9GruTgzELTBRYQM==514p-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----Code:-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----Hash: SHA256\documentclass[12pt, a4paper]{article}\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}\usepackage{lipsum}\usepackage{enumitem}\usepackage{hyperref}\usepackage{parskip}\title{\vspace{-4cm}Draft Domain Purchase Agreement}\date{}\begin{document}\maketitleThis Domain Purchase Agreement (the ``Agreement'') is entered into as of the 10th day of April, 2023 (the ``Effective Date'') by and between:\textbf{Fredrick Brennan}, an individual residing at \textnumero{}597D, North Raleigh Avenue, Atlantic City, New Jersey, United States (``Buyer'') and\textbf{Aubrey Cottle}, an individual residing in Toronto, Ontario, Canada (``Seller'').\textsc{Whereas}, Seller is the owner of the domain name 420chan.org (the ``Domain'');\textsc{Whereas}, Seller owes child support to Brooke Whitlock (the ``3\textsuperscript{rd} Party Beneficiary''), an individual residing in Ontario, Canada, who is a non-signatory party to this Agreement;\textsc{Whereas}, Buyer desires to purchase the Domain from Seller, and Seller desires to sell the Domain to Buyer;\textsc{Now, therefore}, in consideration of the mutual covenants and promises contained herein and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the parties hereto agree as follows:\section*{1. Purchase and Sale of Domain}\begin{enumerate}[label=\textbf{1.\arabic*}]\item Subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement, Seller agrees to sell, transfer, and assign to Buyer, and Buyer agrees to purchase from Seller, all of Seller's rights, title, and interest in and to the Domain for the purchase price of four thousand and two hundred United States dollars, US\$4,200 (the ``Purchase Price'').\item The Purchase Price shall be payable by Buyer to Seller in Ethereum, in accordance with the payment process described in Section 5 of this Agreement.\end{enumerate}\section*{2. Buyer's Obligations}\begin{enumerate}[label=\textbf{2.\arabic*}]\item Buyer agrees to maintain the ownership of the Domain for a minimum of thirty (30) years from the Effective Date, during which time Buyer shall not sell or transfer the Domain, except to a corporation in which Buyer holds a majority stake, or to Buyer's heirs.\item Buyer agrees to renew the Domain registration for a minimum of thirty (30) years from the Effective Date.\item Buyer agrees to point the MX (\textbf{M}ail E\textbf{x}change) records of the Domain, which are responsible for directing email messages to the appropriate mail server, at the servers specified by Seller, for as long as Buyer owns the Domain. Seller may request changes to the MX records up to twelve (12) times per calendar year, with no more than two (2) requests within any fourteen (14) day period. Such requests must be made in writing by electronic mail, and Buyer shall make the requested changes within fourteen (14) days of receiving the request.\end{enumerate}\section*{3. Seller's Representations and Warranties}Seller represents and warrants to Buyer that:\begin{enumerate}[label=(\alph*)]\item Seller is the sole and exclusive owner of the Domain, free and clear of any liens, claims, or encumbrances;\item Seller has the full right, power, and authority to enter into this Agreement and to perform its obligations hereunder.\end{enumerate}\section*{4. Buyer's Representations and Warranties}Buyer represents and warrants to Seller that:\begin{enumerate}[label=(\alph*)]\item Buyer has the full right, power, and authority to enter into this Agreement and to perform its obligations hereunder;\item Buyer will comply with all applicable laws and regulations in connection with its ownership and use of the Domain.\end{enumerate}\section*{5. Payment and Transfer Process}\begin{enumerate}[label=\textbf{5.\arabic*}] \item The parties agree to effect the transfer of the Domain and the payment of the Purchase Price through an escrow service mutually agreed upon by the parties and facilitated through the bitcointalk.org platform (the "Escrow Service"). \item The Purchase Price shall be converted from USD to Ethereum using the exchange rate available on coinbase.com at the time of payment. Buyer shall transfer the Ethereum equivalent of the Purchase Price to the Escrow Service. \item Seller shall transfer the Domain to the Escrow Service in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Escrow Service. Upon confirmation by the Escrow Service that the Domain has been transferred, Buyer shall transfer the Purchase Price in Ethereum to the Escrow Service. \item The Escrow Service shall hold \$420 of the total Purchase Price in trust for the 3\textsuperscript{rd} Party Beneficiary, non-signatory to this Agreement, for up to one calendar year (365 days) following the completion of the transaction. The 3\textsuperscript{rd} Party Beneficiary may choose to claim or not claim the amount held so in trust for her at her discretion within the specified time frame. \item Upon confirmation by the Escrow Service that the Purchase Price in Ethereum has been received, the Escrow Service shall release the Domain to Buyer and the Purchase Price minus the amount held in trust for the 3\textsuperscript{rd} Party Beneficiary to Seller. If the 3\textsuperscript{rd} Party Beneficiary claims the amount held in trust within the specified time frame of one calendar year (365 days), the Escrow Service shall release the claimed amount to her. If the 3\textsuperscript{rd} Party Beneficiary does not claim the amount within the specified time frame, the Escrow Service shall release the unclaimed amount to Seller immediately upon expiration of the holding time frame.\end{enumerate}\section*{6. Miscellaneous}\begin{enumerate}[label=\textbf{6.\arabic*}]\item This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous agreements, negotiations, and understandings, whether written or oral, relating to such subject matter.\item This Agreement may be amended only by a written instrument signed by both parties.\item This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and permitted assigns.\item This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Atlantic City, New Jersey, United States, without regard to its conflicts of law principles. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Atlantic City, New Jersey, United States.\item Any notice or other communication required or permitted to be given hereunder shall be in writing and shall be deemed duly given (i) when delivered personally, (ii) when sent by electronic mail to the parties at their respective email addresses set forth below, or (iii) on the date of transmission, if sent by facsimile, provided that a copy is also sent by another means specified in this section.To Buyer: \href{mailto:copypaste@kittens.ph}{copypaste@kittens.ph} \\To Seller: \href{mailto:kirtaner@420chan.org}{kirtaner@420chan.org}\item If any provision of this Agreement is held to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable in any respect, such invalidity, illegality, or unenforceability shall not affect any other provision hereof, and this Agreement shall be construed as if such invalid, illegal, or unenforceable provision had never been contained herein.\item This Agreement may be executed in counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original, but all of which together shall constitute one and the same instrument. The exchange of copies of this Agreement and of signature pages by electronic mail in portable document format (.pdf) or by any other electronic means intended to preserve the original graphic and pictorial appearance of a document shall have the same effect as the physical delivery of the paper document bearing the original signatures.\end{enumerate}IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the Effective Date.\vspace{1cm}\noindent\rule{5cm}{0.4pt} \hfill \rule{5cm}{0.4pt} \\Fredrick Brennan \hfill Aubrey Cottle \\Buyer \hfill Seller\end{document}-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----iHUEARYIAB0WIQS1rLeeEfG/f0nzK7hYUwVpYvFOWAUCZDR+GQAKCRBYUwVpYvFOWGBXAQDvwJzVVMCrij8v/cB0qVa4lZTLHb0b9bWpR7ZkGz0E/AEAoWN2+pquIVU1k8E5HfthwwFUKGNLzkA+wNBUT0VZrAQ==asc1-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----Code:-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----Hash: -----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----iHUEARYIAB0WIQS1rLeeEfG/f0nzK7hYUwVpYvFOWAUCZDR+jgAKCRBYUwVpYvFOWL3SAP9Zz/3EPlIUTGKYmgBXDM/EogcC9GzuNgx2mEWYo0p+DQD+OUmNN1MBkxEo9D2y1jHb1/zt3+h0Yua6lomrRrhvEAw==AFqO-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----

comments.author: kopipe
comments.body: Cottle finally made contact, we settled a dispute as to the third party beficiary, removing her claim, and this is the contract as of 4/19. Dabs is still holding the purchase price in trust.Code:-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----Hash: SHA256\documentclass[12pt, a4paper]{article}\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}\usepackage{lipsum}\usepackage{enumitem}\usepackage{hyperref}\usepackage{parskip}\title{\vspace{-4cm}Draft Domain Purchase Agreement}\date{\today}\begin{document}\maketitleThis Domain Purchase Agreement (the ``Agreement'') is entered into as of the 20\textsuperscript{th} day of April, 2023 (the ``Effective Date'') by and between:\textbf{Fredrick Brennan}, an individual residing at \textnumero{}597D, North Raleigh Avenue, Atlantic City, New Jersey, United States (``Buyer'') and\textbf{Aubrey Cottle}, an individual residing in Toronto, Ontario, Canada (``Seller'').\textsc{Whereas}, Seller is the owner of the domain name 420chan.org (the ``Domain'');\textsc{Whereas}, Buyer desires to purchase the Domain from Seller, and Seller desires to sell the Domain to Buyer;\textsc{Now, therefore}, in consideration of the mutual covenants and promises contained herein and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the parties hereto agree as follows:\section*{1. Purchase and Sale of Domain}\begin{enumerate}[label=\textbf{1.\arabic*}]\item Subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement, Seller agrees to sell, transfer, and assign to Buyer, and Buyer agrees to purchase from Seller, all of Seller's rights, title, and interest in and to the Domain for the purchase price of four thousand and two hundred United States dollars, US\$4,200 (the ``Purchase Price'').\item The Purchase Price shall be payable by Buyer to Seller in Ethereum, in accordance with the payment process described in Section 5 of this Agreement.\end{enumerate}\section*{2. Buyer's Obligations}\begin{enumerate}[label=\textbf{2.\arabic*}]\item Buyer agrees to maintain the ownership of the Domain for a minimum of thirty (30) years from the Effective Date, during which time Buyer shall not sell or transfer the Domain, except to a corporation in which Buyer holds a majority stake, or to Buyer's heirs.\item Buyer agrees to renew the Domain registration for a minimum of thirty (30) years from the Effective Date.\item Buyer agrees to point the MX (\textbf{M}ail E\textbf{x}change) records of the Domain, which are responsible for directing email messages to the appropriate mail server, at the servers specified by Seller, for as long as Buyer owns the Domain. Seller may request changes to the MX records up to twelve (12) times per calendar year, with no more than two (2) requests within any fourteen (14) day period. Such requests must be made in writing by electronic mail, and Buyer shall make the requested changes within fourteen (14) days of receiving the request.\end{enumerate}\section*{3. Seller's Representations and Warranties}Seller represents and warrants to Buyer that:\begin{enumerate}[label=(\alph*)]\item Seller is the sole and exclusive owner of the Domain, free and clear of any liens, claims, or encumbrances;\item Seller has the full right, power, and authority to enter into this Agreement and to perform its obligations hereunder.\end{enumerate}\section*{4. Buyer's Representations and Warranties}Buyer represents and warrants to Seller that:\begin{enumerate}[label=(\alph*)]\item Buyer has the full right, power, and authority to enter into this Agreement and to perform its obligations hereunder;\item Buyer will comply with all applicable laws and regulations in connection with its ownership and use of the Domain.\end{enumerate}\section*{5. Payment and Transfer Process}\begin{enumerate}[label=\textbf{5.\arabic*}] \item The parties agree to effect the transfer of the Domain and the payment of the Purchase Price through an escrow service mutually agreed upon by the parties and facilitated through the bitcointalk.org platform (the "Escrow Service"). \item The Purchase Price shall be converted from USD to Ethereum using the exchange rate available on coinbase.com at the time of payment. Buyer shall transfer the Ethereum equivalent of the Purchase Price to the Escrow Service. \item Seller shall transfer the Domain to the Escrow Service in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Escrow Service. Upon confirmation by the Escrow Service that the Domain has been transferred, Buyer shall transfer the Purchase Price in Ethereum to the Escrow Service. \item Upon confirmation by the Escrow Service that the Purchase Price in Ethereum has been received, the Escrow Service shall release the Domain to Buyer and the Purchase Price to Seller.\end{enumerate}\section*{6. Miscellaneous}\begin{enumerate}[label=\textbf{6.\arabic*}]\item This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous agreements, negotiations, and understandings, whether written or oral, relating to such subject matter.\item This Agreement may be amended only by a written instrument signed by both parties.\item This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and permitted assigns.\item This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Atlantic City, New Jersey, United States, without regard to its conflicts of law principles. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Atlantic City, New Jersey, United States.\item Any notice or other communication required or permitted to be given hereunder shall be in writing and shall be deemed duly given (i) when delivered personally, (ii) when sent by electronic mail to the parties at their respective email addresses set forth below, or (iii) on the date of transmission, if sent by facsimile, provided that a copy is also sent by another means specified in this section.To Buyer: \href{mailto:copypaste@kittens.ph}{copypaste@kittens.ph} \\To Seller: \href{mailto:kirtaner@420chan.org}{kirtaner@420chan.org}\item If any provision of this Agreement is held to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable in any respect, such invalidity, illegality, or unenforceability shall not affect any other provision hereof, and this Agreement shall be construed as if such invalid, illegal, or unenforceable provision had never been contained herein.\item This Agreement may be executed in counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original, but all of which together shall constitute one and the same instrument. The exchange of copies of this Agreement and of signature pages by electronic mail in portable document format (.pdf) or by any other electronic means intended to preserve the original graphic and pictorial appearance of a document shall have the same effect as the physical delivery of the paper document bearing the original signatures.\end{enumerate}IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement as of the Effective Date.\vspace{1cm}\noindent\rule{5cm}{0.4pt} \hfill \rule{5cm}{0.4pt} \\Fredrick Brennan \hfill Aubrey Cottle \\Buyer \hfill Seller\end{document}-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----iHUEARYIAB0WIQS1rLeeEfG/f0nzK7hYUwVpYvFOWAUCZD+WuwAKCRBYUwVpYvFOWKulAQDtzk9/rp917r2udXv7oF/rb+1W0UIa2AoxTZnsoO4jfAD9Eb3HBW/sJlqQyZls5O1PnNHR22ZzM7joC6+gr7vXRwY==yBA6-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----

comments.author: Dabs
comments.body: Escrow address = 0xC63B8881c3Db1737C284390137cAc6C1D5D56f86 https://etherscan.io/address/0xc63b8881c3db1737c284390137cac6c1d5d56f86Released 2.22523101 ETH to this address = 0x33ed5b55cA3344e43De28A3C6F4fF9A44E870e48https://etherscan.io/address/0x33ed5b55cA3344e43De28A3C6F4fF9A44E870e48Transaction done. Thanks everyone!

comments.author: kopipe
comments.body: Yup, thanks for acting as escrow, and holding it for so long. Then again, can't expect the guy who made 420chan to be particularlyhasty.However, his slowness made it so the deal finalized on 4/20!https://420chan.orgWe ended up going a bit older school on the signing. A signature in DER format is attached to the file contract_signed.pdf, which verifies that...Code:fred@~% sha256sum contract.pdf4621da7f9fbdac578ead51ed4f5a29f8411d6bc7f7e2d3dca6ef8fd31ca16820 contract.pdfIs owned by the owner of the SSL certificate for *.mfek.org (me).Code:fred@~/Downloads/mfek.org% openssl pkcs7 -in signature.p7s -print  Produces the file:https://420chan.org/_historical/nerdshit/contract20230420/%60openssl%20pkcs7%20-in%20signature.p7s%60Which is the original hash of https://420chan.org/_historical/nerdshit/contract20230420/contract.pdfBefore it became https://420chan.org/_historical/nerdshit/contract20230420/contract_signed.pdf,Which is what is at https://420chan.org/contract.pdf.Cottle doesn't seem to have much interest in GnuPG signing the contract himself, (or DER signing via convoluted method above,) but hopefully he still will while it's still 20th April 2023.
